text: personal water craft amend rsa ii to read as follows no person shall operate a personal water craft at more than headway speed within feet of any marsh land or flat in the hampton seabrook estuary within feet of the rye marsh areas to include witch creek seavey creek berry s brook parson s creek awcomin marsh and rye harbor marsh or within the new castle goat island back channel mooring field as defined in rules adopted by the pease development authority pda or that area marked between shapleigh island and goat island to red nun to the wentworth bridge to include the areas around pest leaches and clampit islands without regard to tide height or the landing in hampton falls to hampton such watercraft shall stay in marked channels this paragraph shall not apply to water craft operated by police fire or other emergency services
